meanings.definition: Not having traveled; not having journeyed to different places.
meanings.sent1: The untraveled road stretched out before us, promising new adventures.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of excitement as she embarked on the untraveled path.
meanings.sent3: The untraveled explorer was thrilled to finally set foot on foreign soil.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an untraveled map, waiting to be filled with the wonders of the world.
meanings.sent5: The untraveled landscape was a blank canvas, ready to be painted with memories.

meanings.definition: Not experienced or familiar with traveling; lacking in travel experience.
meanings.sent1: The untraveled tourist was amazed by the sights and sounds of the bustling city.
meanings.sent2: Being untraveled, she found navigating the airport to be a daunting task.
meanings.sent3: The untraveled group of friends got lost in the maze-like streets of the old town.
meanings.sent4: Her untraveled mind was like a closed book, waiting to be opened to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: He approached the untraveled journey with a mix of excitement and nervousness.
